fullText: Jessica Lange gives a tour-de-force performance as the morphine-addicted Mary Tyrone, finding fresh nuances in O'Neill's most devastating family portrait.
dtliExcerpt: Jessica Lange gives a tour-de-force performance as the morphine-addicted Mary Tyrone, finding fresh nuances in O'Neill's most devastating family portrait.
